Summary statistics for students based on sex and free reduced lunch status:

*On average, students with free/reduced lunch status regardless of their sex performed lower than their peers.*

```{r summary-stats, echo=FALSE}
sum <- star %>% 
    group_by(sex, frl) %>% 
    summarize(math_mean = mean(tmathss),
           math_sd = sd(tmathss),
           rdg_mean = mean(treadss),
           rdg_sd = sd(treadss)) %>%
    mutate_if(is.numeric, round, digits=2)
sum
```
